title: Riot why do i have a que time to log into the game.
body: I have spent over 700 dollars on my account i would assume i would be allowed to play a game that iv'e spent so much money on, my que timer to login says 2 hours and 20 minutes as of 15 mins ago now its going up.. saying 2 hours and 30 mins like please fix this immediately and let me play my game.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Riot is extremely grateful for your dedication to the game, but they will not give preferential treatment for paying users.

As for the log in issues, Riot is currently working on fixing them. It shoudln't be too much longer. Read more about that [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/MqQlkEm0-226-na-login-issues).
